content.formatted_body:
In reply to @annevk:matrix.org
It involves Ms2ger (back in 2024 W2)

content.body: I'm quoting from this source: https://infra.spec.whatwg.org/#implementation-defined "Features that are defined in documents using the Infra Standard that can be used as a tracking vector are marked as this paragraph is". This sentence is unclear to me: "are marked as this paragraph is". Can you explain what it means?
chargeitall: it's referencing the fingerprint icon, maybe we should make that more explicit
content.formatted_body: chargeitall: it's referencing the fingerprint icon, maybe we should make that more explicit

content.body: I appreciate your clarification. I was puzzled by the presence of this fingerprint, but I did not see how it related to this phrase since the fingerprint was far from the text.
using only icons and not also text isn't accessible anyways, that should probably be improved
